languages.text: При помощи этого заслуженного оружия были совершены тысячи аутодафе над ведьмами и еретиками. В его топливном баке кипит не обычный прометий, но высокомощная смесь, взрывающаяся при контакте с воздухом.

Thousands of witches and heretics have been incinerated with this distinguished weapon, all in His name. Boiling in its fuel tank is no common promethium, but rather a highly potent mixture that detonates on contact with air.
languages.original_text: При помощи этого заслуженного оружия были совершены тысячи аутодафе над ведьмами и еретиками. В его топливном баке кипит не обычный прометий, но высокомощная смесь, взрывающаяся при контакте с воздухом.

traits.locale_text: Thousands of autos-da-fe have been performed on witches and heretics with this distinguished weapon. Boiling in its fuel tank is no common promethium but a highly potent mixture that detonates on contact with air.

Thousands of autos-da-fe have been performed on witches and heretics with this distinguished weapon. Boiling in its fuel tank is no common promethium but a highly potent mixture that detonates on contact with air.

Thousands of witches and heretics have been incinerated with this distinguished weapon, all in His name. Boiling in its fuel tank is no common promethium, but rather a highly potent mixture that detonates on contact with air.

Thousands of witches and heretics have been incinerated with this distinguished weapon, all in His name. Boiling in its fuel tank is no common promethium, but rather a highly potent mixture that detonates on contact with air.

Thousands of witches and heretics have been incinerated with this distinguished weapon, all in His name. Boiling in its fuel tank is no common promethium, but rather a highly potent mixture that detonates on contact with air.

languages.text: Miles de brujas y herejes han sido incinerados en nombre del Emperador con esta distinguida arma. El líquido de su tanque no es simple prometio, sino una mezcla extremadamente potente que estalla al contacto con el aire.
languages.original_text: Thousands of witches and heretics have been incinerated with this distinguished weapon, all in His name. Boiling in its fuel tank is no common promethium, but rather a highly potent mixture that detonates on contact with air.

traits.locale_text: Miles de brujas y herejes han sido incinerados en nombre del Emperador con esta distinguida arma. El líquido de su tanque no es simple prometio, sino una mezcla extremadamente potente que estalla al contacto con el aire.

languages.text: Cette arme élégante a permis d'incinérer des milliers de sorcières et d'hérétiques, tout cela en Son nom divin. Le prométhium qui bouillonne dans son réservoir n'est pas un carburant classique, mais un mélange très puissant qui explose au contact de l'air.
languages.original_text: Thousands of witches and heretics have been incinerated with this distinguished weapon, all in His name. Boiling in its fuel tank is no common promethium, but rather a highly potent mixture that detonates on contact with air.

traits.locale_text: Cette arme élégante a permis d'incinérer des milliers de sorcières et d'hérétiques, tout cela en Son nom divin. Le prométhium qui bouillonne dans son réservoir n'est pas un carburant classique, mais un mélange très puissant qui explose au contact de l'air.

languages.text: 这件恐怖的武器曾以神皇的名义，将成千上万女巫与异端分子化作灰烬。它的燃料箱中沸腾的不是普通的钷素，而是一种极其强力的混合物，只要与空气接触就会引发爆炸。
languages.original_text: Thousands of witches and heretics have been incinerated with this distinguished weapon, all in His name. Boiling in its fuel tank is no common promethium, but rather a highly potent mixture that detonates on contact with air.

traits.locale_text: 这件恐怖的武器曾以神皇的名义，将成千上万女巫与异端分子化作灰烬。它的燃料箱中沸腾的不是普通的钷素，而是一种极其强力的混合物，只要与空气接触就会引发爆炸。

languages.text: 何千人もの魔女や異端者が、主の名の下に、この卓越した武器で焼却されてきた。燃料タンクで沸騰しているのは一般的なプロメチウムではなく、空気に触れると爆発する非常に強力な混合物だ。
languages.original_text: Thousands of witches and heretics have been incinerated with this distinguished weapon, all in His name. Boiling in its fuel tank is no common promethium, but rather a highly potent mixture that detonates on contact with air.

traits.locale_text: 何千人もの魔女や異端者が、主の名の下に、この卓越した武器で焼却されてきた。燃料タンクで沸騰しているのは一般的なプロメチウムではなく、空気に触れると爆発する非常に強力な混合物だ。

languages.text: Tausende von Hexen und Ketzern wurden von dieser angesehenen Waffe eingeäschert, alles in seinem Namen. In ihrem Brennstofftank brodelt kein gewöhnliches Promethium, sondern eine äußerst potente Mischung, die bei Kontakt mit der Luft detoniert.
languages.original_text: Thousands of witches and heretics have been incinerated with this distinguished weapon, all in His name. Boiling in its fuel tank is no common promethium, but rather a highly potent mixture that detonates on contact with air.

traits.locale_text: Tausende von Hexen und Ketzern wurden von dieser angesehenen Waffe eingeäschert, alles in seinem Namen. In ihrem Brennstofftank brodelt kein gewöhnliches Promethium, sondern eine äußerst potente Mischung, die bei Kontakt mit der Luft detoniert.

languages.text: Binlerce cadı ve kâfir, bu seçkin silahla İmparator adına yakılmıştır. Yakıt deposunda kaynayan sıradan bir prometyum değil, havayla temas ettiğinde patlayan son derece güçlü bir karışımdır.
languages.original_text: Thousands of witches and heretics have been incinerated with this distinguished weapon, all in His name. Boiling in its fuel tank is no common promethium, but rather a highly potent mixture that detonates on contact with air.
